definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: The garden is carpeted with a mass of multicoloured flowers .
sentences.chinese: 花園裏花草茂密，五彩繽紛。

sentences.english: They had encamped among the thick grass.
This house finds its place in a big forest of pines, near the beach.
sentences.chinese: 希貝爾塔別墅毗鄰海灘，隱於茂密的大松林間。

sentences.english: They shot poisoned arrows from behind the thick bushes.
sentences.chinese: 他們從茂密的灌木叢後射出了毒箭。

sentences.english: The forest was large and thickly overgrown with all kinds of leaf-bearing trees.
sentences.chinese: 這是一座很大很茂密的森林，長滿生有各種葉子的樹。

sentences.english: In northeastern Sicily you'll find lush forests.
sentences.chinese: 在西西里島東北部，你會發現茂密的森林。

sentences.english: Each bamboo house was surrounded by a thriving orchard.
sentences.chinese: 每座竹樓周圍都茂密的果園。

sentences.english: In the middle of the day they set the hounds into a ravine covered with thickly growing young copse .
sentences.chinese: 日當午，他們把獵犬放進長滿茂密的幼林的峽谷。

sentences.english: Sunlight percolated through the thick leaves.
Ups and downs, there are lush snow mountains and spruces .
sentences.chinese: 山巒起伏跌宕，生長着茂密的雪嶺雲杉，蒼蒼莽莽。

sentences.english: The fields were thick with wild green grass and bursts of yellow flowers.
sentences.chinese: 田地裏長滿了茂密的野草，盛開着黃色的花朵。

sentences.english: They abided in the wooded hills.
sentences.chinese: 他們一直住在樹木茂密的山裏。

sentences.english: The geological prospectors bedded down for the night under the shelter of leafy trees.
sentences.chinese: 地質勘探隊員們在枝葉茂密的樹下露宿。

sentences.english: It can also see down through thick foliage to locate hidden areas of fire.
sentences.chinese: 還可以看到茂密的樹葉下找到藏有火災隱患的區域。

sentences.english: When luxuriant and thick trees hide us from view again.
sentences.chinese: 當茂密的樹木再次遮擋那一縷光線。

sentences.english: One day the mother rabbit with baby rabbit into dense woods mushroom.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，兔媽媽帶着兔寶寶到茂密的森林裏去採蘑菇。

definition: verdant/lush green and full of life
Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
